class.name: NohubResult
class.brief_description: Represents the result of a [NohubClient] call
class.description: If the call was successful, this instance will store the resulting value, and [method is_success] will return [code]true[/code]. This class has multiple specializations, each implementing a [code]value()[/code] method that returns a type-safe success result. [br][br]If the call failed, [method is_success] will return [code]false[/code]. The actual error is returned by [method error].

method.name: of_success
method.description: Construct a successful result without any value

method.name: is_success
method.description: Return true if the operation was successful

method.name: error
method.description: Return the error, or [code]null[/code] if the operation was successful
